languages.text: "Утверждение истинно. Также в Благословенной Электродинамической обители мы обнаружили тела неизвестных, проникших в монастырь под видом членов культа Последнего восхода. Гипотеза, что все носители идентификационного кода магоса Ханейманна являются объектами преследования, имеет основания".

"This statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение истинно. Также в Благословенной Электродинамической обители мы обнаружили тела неизвестных, проникших в монастырь под видом членов культа Последнего восхода. Гипотеза, что все носители идентификационного кода магоса Ханейманна являются объектами преследования, имеет основания".

traits.locale_text: "The statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是正确的。此外，还有我们在神圣电驱修会中发现的那些尸体，那些人都是伪装成‘终末黎明’邪教分子的渗透者。我们有足够的理由假设，所有携带哈努曼贤者识别代码的人，都会成为袭击的对象。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是正确的。此外，还有我们在神圣电驱力修会中发现的那些尸体，那些人都是伪装成‘终末黎明’邪教分子的渗透者。我们有足够的理由假设，所有携带哈努曼贤者识别代码的人，都会成为袭击的对象。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. También están los cadáveres que encontramos en el sagrado cenobium electrodinámico que pertenecían a infiltradores que fingían ser miembros del Culto del Amanecer Final. La hipótesis de que todos los portadores del código de identificación del magos Haneumann son objetivos de esta persecución tiene mérito».
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es verdadera. También están los cadáveres que encontramos en el sagrado cenobium electrodinámico que pertenecían a infiltradores que fingían ser miembros del Culto del Amanecer Final. La hipótesis de que todos los portadores del código de identificación del magos Haneumann son objetivos de esta persecución tiene mérito».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は真実だ。我らが神聖なる電力連生体で発見した遺体も、最後の夜明け教団のメンバーを装った正体不明の潜入者だった。マゴス・ヘニュマンの識別コードを持つ者はすべて迫害の対象であるという仮説には評価すべき点がある」
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は真実だ。我らが神聖なる電力連生体で発見した遺体も、最後の夜明け教団のメンバーを装った正体不明の潜入者だった。マゴス・ヘニュマンの識別コードを持つ者はすべて迫害の対象であるという仮説には評価すべき点がある」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Es gab auch noch die Leichen, die wir im Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium entdeckt haben, von unbekannten Eindringlingen, die sich als Mitglieder des Kults der letzten Dämmerung ausgegeben hatten. Es könnte etwas an der Hypothese dran sein, dass alle Träger von Magos Haneumanns Identifikationscode Ziele sind."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Es gab auch noch die Leichen, die wir im Heiligen Elektrodynamischen Cenobium entdeckt haben, von unbekannten Eindringlingen, die sich als Mitglieder des Kults der letzten Dämmerung ausgegeben hatten. Es könnte etwas an der Hypothese dran sein, dass alle Träger von Magos Haneumanns Identifikationscode Ziele sind."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette affirmation est exacte. N'oublions pas non plus les cadavres que nous avons découverts dans le Cenobium électrodynamique sacré, ceux de ces infiltrés inconnus qui s'étaient fait passer pour des membres du Culte de l'Aube finale. On peut conférer une certaine crédibilité à l'hypothèse selon laquelle tous les porteurs du code d'identification du magos Haneumann sont la cible de persécutions. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."

traits.locale_text: « Affirmatif. N'oublions pas non plus les cadavres que nous avons découverts dans le Cenobium électrodynamique sacré, ceux de ces infiltrés inconnus qui s'étaient fait passer pour des membres du Culte de l'Aube finale. On peut conférer une certaine crédibilité à l'hypothèse selon laquelle tous les porteurs du code d'identification du magos Haneumann sont la cible de persécutions. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."

languages.text: "Bu önerme doğru. Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'nda keşfettiğimiz, Nihai Şafak Tarikatı mensubu kılığındaki bilinmeyen casuslara ait cesetleri de anımsamaktayım. Magos Haneumann'ın kimlik tanıma kodunu taşıyan herkesin ortadan kaldırma faaliyetlerinin bir hedefi olduğuna dair hipotezinde gerçeklik payı olduğu görülebiliyor."
languages.original_text: "This statement is true. There were also the bodies we discovered in the Hallowed Electrodynamic Cenobium, of unknown infiltrators who had posed as members of the Cult of the Final Dawn. There is merit to the hypothesis that all carriers of Magos Haneumann's identification code are targets of persecution."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme doğru. Mukaddes Elektrodinamik Senobiyumu'nda keşfettiğimiz, Nihai Şafak Tarikatı üyesi kılığına girmiş bilinmeyen casuslara ait cesetleri de anımsamaktayım. Magos Haneumann'ın kimlik tanıma kodunu taşıyan herkesin ortadan kaldırma faaliyetlerinin bir hedefi olduğuna dair hipotezdeki gerçeklik payı görülebiliyor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
